price: Ele disse: "Senhor meu! Por certo, convoquei meu povo, durante a noite e durante o dia;"
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
